title: FireSat adds orbit visualization software to help firefighters plan around satellite passes
summary: The Earth Fire Alliance awarded a contract of undisclosed value to ExoAnalytic Solutions to develop orbit visualization software for the FireSat wildfire-detection satellite constellation. The software aims to help firefighters and researchers plan operations based on satellite pass timing and sensor coverage.
why_it_matters: The contract addresses a critical gap in wildfire monitoring by providing tools to visualize satellite orbits and sensor coverage, improving operational decision-making for fire response and research.
